ygData.subject: Re: Random Number Generators
ygData.msgSnippet: Here we go, you hit my territory.  I deal Roulette and I can tell you that on a legit wheel, I have seen the same number show up 3 times in a row!  Yes, that
ygData.messageBody:
Here we go, you hit my territory. I deal Roulette and I can tell you
that on a legit wheel, I have seen the same number show up 3 times in
a row! Yes, that is right, 1 number of 38 possibles, three times in
a row. How's that for random? Seen it happen twice. As you can
imagine, 2 in a row happens all the time. And yes, have seen 10+ of
same colors. I also deal Blackjack and one night, in a single deck
deal, after 5 shuffles and 1 cut, I dealt all 4 Aces in a row!
Amazing!

See how far off topic we are folks? Let's get back to bard stuff :p

My contribution.... I got my butt kicked in the Arena this weekend by
a ranger that was 1 level below me because his MR was buffed beyond
belief :(

~Beatdrop

--- In eqbards@egroups.com, Jeffrey Sue <jsue@r...> wrote:
> heh, i'd be willing to bet they are using the built in c code
random number generator.
> the problem is you are just using your perceptions of what
happens. and what sticks
> out is going to be the anomaly. if you sat down for an hour and
kept clicking the song
> icon and tracked how many fails and when they occurred in relation
to the others, i would
> think that you would find that it is random.
>
> i mean take a roulette wheel. it's almost a 50/50 chance for red
or black to come up. strings
> of 10+ red or 10+ black are hardly uncommon.
